TaskDescription.Detail: Open a new Excel file to add, delete, and select sheets.

Assist.value: You can designate a variable to contain the opened Excel file. Store in RESULT by default.
Specifies whether to make the Excel document visible on the screen when opening it. When activated, the Excel file becomes invisible.
Specifies the sheet name. Input 'Sheet Brity'.
You can specify the position where the new worksheet will be created. If set to 1, it is created after the first sheet.
Input the sequence number of the worksheet to get the name from. Input 2 to get the second sheet name (Sheet Brity).
Specifies the variable to save the sheet name. Input this.SheetName.
Specifies the string to be input. Input this.SheetName to input the sheet name you got before.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be copied. Input 'Sheet Brity'
Specifies the destination sheet name to be pasted. Input 'Sheet Brity 2'.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be copied. Input 'Sheet Brity'
Specifies the destination sheet name to be pasted. Input 'Sheet Brity 3'.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be moved. Input 'Sheet Brity 2'
Specify the sheet name to be placed behind the moving target. Input 'Sheet1' to move it to the front.
Specifies the name of the sheet to be deleted. Input 'Sheet Brity'.
Specifies the path to save the file. Input Global.ProjectDir + 'test.xlsx' to save to the current project path.
Close the Excel document opened in the background.
Specifies whether to force quit. Please enable it to force quit.
